comments.body: we should improve this, `StructField` is not friendly to users
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -79,30 +92,114 @@ d                   	string
 
 
 -- !query 6
-DESC t PARTITION (c='Us', d=2)
+DESC EXTENDED t
 -- !query 6 schema
-struct<>
+struct<col_name:string,data_type:string,comment:string>
 -- !query 6 output
+# Detailed Table Information	CatalogTable(
+	Table: `default`.`t`
+	Created: 
+	Last Access: 
+	Type: MANAGED
+	Schema: [StructField(a,StringType,true), StructField(b,IntegerType,true), StructField(c,StringType,true), StructField(d,StringType,true)]
